title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Develop a clear and comprehensive understanding of the system's purpose, functionalities, features, and target audience.

title: Design AI and Machine Learning Architecture
description: Plan and design the AI and ML components necessary for accurate and efficient translation.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for users to input text, select languages, and view translations.
dependencies: Design AI and Machine Learning Architecture

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the server-side components to handle requests, process translations, and manage user accounts.
dependencies: Design AI and Machine Learning Architecture

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Create and set up the necessary databases to store user data, translation history, and machine learning models.

title: Implement DevOps Strategy
description: Plan and execute the deployment, scaling, monitoring, and maintenance of the TranslationTransformer system.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing
description: Test the system for functionality, performance, usability, and security to ensure it meets expectations.

title: Secure the TranslationTransformer System
description: Ensure that the system is protected against potential threats and vulnerabilities.

title: Document the TranslationTransformer System
description: Write clear and concise technical documentation for developers, users, and other stakeholders.
